project_descr: Support to the UN Country Team through the Office of the UN Resident Coordinator, including joint UN communications and support to UN joint programming

outputs.output_descr: UN priorities are communicated in a coherent and strategic manner, and awareness is raised on common thematic areas, such as Sustainable Development Goals, human rights and other international standards and commitments
